Articles.Content:
Archibald Kerman plants a flag on the hill.

My hill.
the megaverse throws the mod out and in doing so becomes enterable but still penetrable

It hits a reality sign and reforms into a hill that looks like Earth now.

No one's hill.

\*Walks over\*

Mine.

The hill collapses, leaving starwhip stuck inside of it. No hill should be shaped like earth, or any ellipsoid.

My trapped red dragon.

I'm my own damn (trapped ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)) dragon, thank you very much!

Dig me out, please?

my space marines, having survived the impact, go and rescue star whip and his dragon because of BIONICLES on the kardas drago and other dragons leaving almost enough power for a dragon beam to destroy all hills

my lack of hills

And yet you are killed by a coalesced hill.

No one's hill.

Hey, there's a cave in this one! (So not a cliche... :/)

Mine. Now I just need some valuables.

Don't discuss Minecraft here.

My mudflat.

Since when did my lair become a mudflat? Eech. I've got to find a better living space, apparently.

I'll just wait until Sun's heat drys the mud, then I claim the barren desert that it creates. I heard that sand is good for scales.

A giant horde of mudkipz comes and flattens you. Also they keep the mud wet for another 4 years. Mudkipz.

My almost eternal mud flats.

They ran out of water and decomposes. The ground then dries up.

Then I plant the flag. My hill.

\*heavy rains\*

My mudflat.

K-TV -- BREAKING NEWS: Freak asteroid impacts mudflat, causes rebounded crater, KSC to help?

I claim the peak in the middle of the crater.

I send a nuclear tipped rod from god (delayed explosion) and devastate the surrounding area.

My devastated area

\*universe restart\*

My hill.

I build a mountain on your hill.

My mountain.

A giant slime jumps onto your mountain and dissolves it.

My slime.

\*switches MC off\*

My computer.

I make a hill.

My hill.

(doing it simply)
I do nothing. my pointless post. this continues for 30000000 years until everyone is dead and the hill has eroded

\*universe restarts\*

My mudflat, complete with someone in rubber boots stuck in it.

I take you hill by force.

My two hills.
what hill? you die in suns now quickmud mudflat, which is destroyed by exterminus
